description.p: You are a covert operative working for a government, military, or private organization. You have been trained in the arts of espionage, infiltration, and information gathering.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Investigation, Persuasion, Stealth
Languages: Two of your choice
Equipment: A badge or emblem from your faction, a set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I idolize a particular hero of my faction, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working towards peace.
I see omens in every event and action.
Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other factions and respect (or condemn) them.
I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my faction's elite. Rough living grates on me.
I have little practical experience dealing with people in the world.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
Change. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
Power. I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy. (Evil)
Faith. I trust that my leader will guide my actions, I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of my leader's favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I would die to recover an artifact of my faction that was lost long ago.
I will someday get revenge on the corrupt faction hierarchy who branded me a heretic.
I owe my life to the faction member who took me in when my parents died.
Everything I do is for the common people.
I will do anything to protect the faction where I served.
I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
I put too much trust in those who wield power within my faction's hierarchy.
My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my faction.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

description.p: You have a contact within your faction who can provide you with information and assistance. This contact can help you gather intelligence, provide safe houses, or supply you with equipment.
You are a professional tracker and hunter of people. Whether you work within the bounds of the law or outside them, you have made a career of finding those who don't want to be found.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, Persuasion, Perception
Tool Proficiencies: Slicing kit
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A set of manacles, a helmet with a built-in scanner, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 200 credits

setters.set: Deception, Insight, Persuasion, Perception, Slicing Kit, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable or where such things could be hidden.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
I blow up at the slightest insult.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Good)
Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Chaotic)
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can jog on for all I care. (Neutral)
Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
If there's a plan, I'll forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll ignore it.
I have a tell that reveals when I'm lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I'm okay with that.

description.p: You have access to a network of informants and can find information about most wanted individuals. You can spend time in populated areas to gather information about bounties.
You are an experienced criminal with a history of breaking the law. You have spent a lot of time among other criminals and still have contacts within the criminal underworld.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Intimidation, Sleight of Hand, Stealth
Tool Proficiencies: Slicing kit
Equipment: A slicing kit, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Deception, Intimidation, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Slicing Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable or where such things could be hidden.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
I blow up at the slightest insult.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Good)
Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Chaotic)
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)
Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
If there's a plan, I'll forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll ignore it.
I have a tell that reveals when I'm lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I'm okay with that.

description.p: You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals. You know how to get messages to and from your contact, even over great distances.
You thrive in front of an audience. You know how to entrance them, entertain them, and even inspire them.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Acrobatics, Insight, Performance, Sleight of Hand
Tool Proficiencies: One type of musical instrument
Equipment: A musical instrument (one of your choice), the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket), a costume, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Acrobatics, Insight, Performance, Sleight of Hand, Musical Instrument

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip.
I'm a hopeless romantic, always searching for that special someone.
Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension.
I love a good insult, even one directed at me.
I get bitter if I'm not the center of attention.
I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Lawful)
Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Good)
Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Evil)
People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters. (Neutral)
Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My instrument is my most treasured possession, and it reminds me of someone I love.
Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I'll get it back.
I want to be famous, whatever it takes.
I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person's.
I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival.
I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I'll do anything to win fame and renown.
I'm a sucker for a pretty face.
A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around.
I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.
Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends.

description.p: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or tavern but possibly with a circus, at a theater, or even in a noble's court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard.
You are a skilled technician and inventor, trained in the repair and modification of machinery, electronics, and droids.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Investigation, Sleight of Hand, Athletics, History
Tool Proficiencies: Repair kit
Equipment: A repair kit, a set of common clothes, a technical manual, a set of precision tools, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Investigation, Sleight of Hand, Athletics, History, Repair Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I look up to a renowned engineer in my field, and often talk about their work.
I constantly compare my current situation to my past experiments, many of which went terrifyingly wrong.
I believe scientific results always comes first.
I only speak in short incomplete and concise sentences, as they are optimized for efficient communication.
I often get lost in my own thoughts and contemplation, becoming oblivious to my surroundings.
I am unable to think logically under great stress, and begin to shout random scientific words.
I do not believe in etiquette and disregard social expectations.
I was, in fact, grown and raised in a laboratory.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Transparency. All discoveries should be open to everyone. (Lawful)
Logic. Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Good)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Chaotic)
Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress. (Evil)
Live and Let Live. Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My research is also my best companion.
I will get revenge on the criminals that stole my research.
The school I studied at is the most important place in the world to me.
One day I will return to my home planet and prove that I am the greatest scientist of them all.
I believe my research will be the key to saving the life of a loved one.
I owe my instructor a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I believe only other scientists deserve my respect.
I fail to understand why people don't understand my technical jargon.
I experiment on myself without thinking about the long term consequences.
I am paranoid that people are out to steal my research.
I believe I work better when under the influence of intoxicants.
I work on my research to the point where I ignore my own bodily needs.

description.p: You have an intuitive understanding of how mechanical and electronic devices work. Given sufficient time and materials, you can repair most damaged equipment or create simple devices.
You have spent your life studying the ways of the Force and the teachings of the Jedi Order.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Insight, Investigation, History, Persuasion, Arcana
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A set of Jedi robes, a holocron containing Jedi teachings, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Insight, Investigation, History, Persuasion, Arcana, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I idolize a particular Jedi, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working towards peace.
I see omens in every event and action. The Force tries to speak to us, we just need to listen
Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
I quote (or misquote) sacred Jedi texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
I am tolerant (or intolerant) of those who don't support the Jedi.
I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society. Rough living grates on me.
I've spent so long in the Jedi temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the world.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
Change. We must help bring about the changes the Force is constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
Power. I hope to one day rise to the rank of Jedi Master. (Evil)
Faith. I trust that the Force will guide my actions; I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of the Force by matching my actions against the Jedi teachings. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I would die to recover an ancient Jedi relic that was lost long ago.
I will someday get revenge on those who razed my temple.
I owe my life to the Jedi who took me in when my parents died.
Everything I do is for the common people.
I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies seek to destroy.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple's hierarchy.
My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in the Force.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

description.p: You know the Jedi Code by heart: There is no emotion, there is peace. There is no ignorance, there is knowledge. There is no passion, there is serenity. There is no chaos, there is harmony. There is no death, there is the Force.
You were raised in the warrior culture of Mandalore, bound by the Resol'nare - the six actions that define what it means to be Mandalorian.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Athletics, Intimidation, Survival, History
Tool Proficiencies: Hover pack
Languages: Mando'a
Equipment: A suit of Mandalorian armor, a clan sigil, a hover pack, and a belt pouch containing 200 credits

setters.set: Athletics, Intimidation, Survival, History, Hover Pack, Mando'a

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I try and bring my culture to outsiders.
I always put my clan first.
I follow the Resol'nare to the letter.
I love a good spar.
I enjoy traveling the galaxy.
I keep a small trophy on me to remind me of a past victory.
I view the force as dishonorable in combat.
I've seen the horrors of battle and try to prevent it.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Tradition. I live by my clan's ways, and will continue to do so. (Lawful)
Power. I strive to be the best warrior, no matter who stands in my way. (Good)
Respect. I have earned the respect of many, and I intend to keep it. (Chaotic)
Freedom. I enjoy having the ability to do whatever I want. (Evil)
Comradery. I'll put everything on the line for those dear to me. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I'll succeed in my goals, it just takes time and effort. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I lost someone dear to me in battle, I will always honor them.
Honor is everything to me.
I will lay down my life for those beside me.
I must keep the traditions of my ancestors alive.
No matter where I go, Mandalore is my home.
In death, I will find glory.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I look down on outsiders.
I have no respect for anyone who flees. Cowardice is unacceptable.
I don't see much use in talking, a blaster is all I need to make my point.
I stick to my traditions no matter what, even at the cost of others.
I retreated once, and I've regretted it ever since.
I value a victory regardless of the ethics behind the victory.

description.p: You can always find a place to stay and resupply among other Mandalorians, provided you adhere to the Resol'nare. Other Mandalorians will recognize you as one of their own and offer you hospitality.
You are a soldier for hire, selling your combat skills to the highest bidder. You've fought in countless conflicts across the galaxy.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Athletics, Investigation, Deception, Intimidation
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A uniform from your last mercenary company, a trophy from a past battle, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 credits

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I do not fear death, but accept it as part of life.
I have a crude sense of humor.
I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
I find it good luck to have a flask of ale on me even when the most of my other belongings are gone.
I ask a lot of questions.
I never pass up a friendly wager.
I am always polite and respectful when speaking to those above my station.
I like a job well done, especially if I'm not the one doing it.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Greed. I'm only doing it for the money. (Lawful)
Fairness. We all did the work. it is only right that everyone gets a share of the reward. (Good)
Live and Let Live. You may not have a family left, but your enemy may. A little compassion goes a long way. (Chaotic)
Measure of Last Resort. Sometimes we have to do things that we REALLY don't want to do, but we must remember that we only do them because we have to. (Evil)
Debts. I never leave a favor left undone and nor will I leave those whom owe me favors on the hook. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I have heard a tale of a legendary person of my class. I strive to be more like them. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I have a personal debt that must be paid.
I am with friends whom I trust with my life as they should trust me with theirs.
I come from a family that dislikes weaknesses, so I push myself to know my weaknesses.
My life is my honor. I shall, until death, shape my life to what I want it to be.
Without a purpose in the world, I find myself to be broken which I do not like.
I secretly pursue a love interest that is forbidden by a family whether it is my own or my love's family.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am always looking for the bigger pay.
I can't tell a lie for the life of me.
I judge too easily by special appearance and pride.
I am almost always carrying some ale in with my gear.
I believe that I am the only skilled person of the group and am even open about it.
I will never let a comrade stand alone, even if it gets me killed.

description.p: You have connections with various mercenary companies and can find work as a hired soldier relatively easily. When in civilized areas, you can find information about upcoming conflicts and potential employers.
You understand wealth, power, and privilege. You carry a noble title, and your family owns land, collects taxes, and wields significant political influence.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, History, Persuasion
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 250 credits

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel like the most wonderful and important person in the world.
The common folk love me for my kindness and generosity.
No one could doubt by looking at my regal bearing that I am a cut above the unwashed masses.
I take great pains to always look my best and follow the latest fashions.
I don't like to get my hands dirty, and I won't be caught dead in unsuitable accommodations.
Despite my noble birth, I do not place myself above other folk. We all have the same blood.
My favor, once lost, is lost forever.
If you do me an injury, I will crush you, ruin your name, and salt your fields.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Respect. Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity. (Lawful)
Responsibility. It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me, just as those below me must respect mine. (Good)
Independence. I must prove that I can handle myself without the coddling of my family. (Chaotic)
Power. If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do. (Evil)
Family. Blood runs thicker than water. (Neutral)
Noble Obligation. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family.
My house's alliance with another noble family must be sustained at all costs.
Nothing is more important than the other members of my family.
I am in love with the heir of a family that my family despises.
My loyalty to my sovereign is unwavering.
The common folk must see me as a hero of the people.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I secretly believe that everyone is beneath me.
I hide a truly scandalous secret that could ruin my family forever.
I too often hear veiled insults and threats in every word addressed to me, and I'm quick to anger.
I have an insatiable desire for carnal pleasures.
In fact, the world does revolve around me.
By my words and actions, I often bring shame to my family.

description.p: Thanks to your noble birth, people are inclined to think the best of you. You are welcome in high society, and people assume you have the right to be wherever you are. The common folk make every effort to accommodate you and avoid your displeasure, and other people of high birth treat you as a member of the same social sphere. You can secure an audience with a local noble if you need to.
You have traveled the galaxy, never staying in one place for long. You have learned to survive in harsh environments and adapt to new cultures.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Survival, Medicine
Tool Proficiencies: One type of musical instrument
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A musical instrument, a trophy from an animal you hunted, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 credits

setters.set: Animal Handling, Athletics, Survival, Medicine, Musical Instrument, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I'm driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home.
I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.
I once ran twenty-five miles without stopping to warn my clan of an approaching horde. I'd do it again if I had to.
I have a lesson for every situation, drawn from observing nature.
I place no stock in wealthy or well-mannered folk. Money and manners won't save you from a hungry rancor.
I'm always picking things up, absently fiddling with them, and sometimes accidentally breaking them.
I feel far more comfortable around animals than people.
I was, in fact, raised by wampas.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Lawful)
Greater Good. It is each person's responsibility to make the most happiness for the whole tribe. (Good)
Honor. If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole clan. (Chaotic)
Might. The strongest are meant to rule. (Evil)
Nature. The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization. (Neutral)
Glory. I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My family, clan, or tribe is the most important thing in my life, even when they are far from me.
An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me.
I will bring terrible wrath down on the Darkdoers who destroyed my homeland.
I am the last of my tribe, and it is up to me to ensure their names enter legend.
I suffer awful visions of a coming disaster and will do anything to prevent it.
It is my duty to provide children to sustain my tribe.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.
There's no room for caution in a life lived to the fullest.
I remember every insult I've received and nurse a silent resentment toward anyone who's ever wronged me.
I am slow to trust members of other species, tribes, and societies.
Violence is my answer to almost any challenge.
Don't expect me to save those who can't save themselves. It is nature's way that the strong thrive and the weak perish.

description.p: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you. In addition, you can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

You spent your youth under the sway of a dreaded pirate, learning how to survive in a world of sharks and cutthroats. You may have been a sailor on a starship, a pilot in a fighter squadron, or part of a pirate crew raiding cargo vessels.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, Sleight of Hand
Tool Proficiencies: Slicing kit
Equipment: A slicing kit, a set of common clothes, a piece of jewelry worth 100 credits, and a belt pouch containing 50 credits

setters.set: Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, Sleight of Hand, Slicing Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I respect my captain and trust my crew. It may be all that saves my life one day.
Whether the credits comes from the split of the spoils or from a side wager, I'll get my hands on it.
When my blood gets up, my swearing could boil the icy tundra of Hoth.
I enjoy spreading the tales of my exploits, no matter who hears.
I never let witnesses escape from a raid.
I take what I need, but I don't kill without reason.
I always have an exit planned.
I assume everyone else wants to take what I have.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Equal Shares. All hands who spend sweat and blood earn their share of the credits. (Lawful)
Adventure. I'm far from home, and everything is strange and wonderful! (Good)
Greater Good. I raid to weaken the Empire that threatens my people, but I don't steal from civilians. (Chaotic)
Strength. The weak exist to feed the strong, and I am strong. (Evil)
Crew. A ship is nothing without her crew. Protect your mates. (Neutral)
Ambition. One day I will be so much more than a captain. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My band and I will be known across the world, and we'll never be forgotten.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Everything I do is for the good of my people.
My ship and many of her crew were lost to treachery, and I won't rest until I discover who was behind it.
My ship comes first, and all other loyalties simply pale in comparison.
A crew member of a ship we raided saved my life, and I don't know how to resolve that debt.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I never back down from a fight.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
I was drunk on watch when my ship was lost to an ambush. I can't set the shame aside.
I feel I'm entitled to a greater share of the spoils, no matter the circumstances.
I won't let myself be captured. If a raid goes sour, I'm the first to run for cover.
I get lost in the thrill of the raid and can't focus on the details of a plan.

description.p: When you need to, you can secure free passage on a starship for yourself and your adventuring companions. You might sail on the ship you served on, or another ship you have good relations with (perhaps one captained by a former crewmate). Because you're calling in a favor, you can't be certain of a schedule or route that will meet your every need. Your Dungeon Master will determine how long it takes to get where you need to go. In return for your free passage, you and your companions are expected to assist the crew during the voyage.

You have spent years studying the galaxy's mysteries, conducting research, and expanding the boundaries of knowledge. Your expertise may be in biology, physics, astronomy, or any other scientific field.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from History, Medicine, Nature, Investigation
Tool Proficiencies: Slicing kit
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A slicing kit, a datapad, a set of common clothes, a letter from a colleague, and a belt pouch containing 100 credits

setters.set: History, Medicine, Nature, Investigation, Slicing Kit, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I look up to a renowned scientist in my field, and often talk about their work.
I constantly compare my current situation to my past experiments, many of which went terrifyingly wrong.
I believe scientific results always comes first.
I only speak in short incomplete and concise sentences, as they are optimized for efficient communication.
I often get lost in my own thoughts and contemplation, becoming oblivious to my surroundings.
I am unable to think logically under great stress, and begin to shout random scientific words.
I do not believe in etiquette and disregard social expectations.
I was, in fact, grown and raised in a laboratory.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Transparency. All discoveries should be open to everyone. (Lawful)
Logic. Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Good)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Chaotic)
Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress. (Evil)
Live and Let Live. Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My research is also my best companion.
I will get revenge on the criminals that stole my research.
The school I studied at is the most important place in the world to me.
One day I will return to my home planet and prove that I am the greatest scientist of them all.
I believe my research will be the key to saving the life of a loved one.
I owe my instructor a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I believe only other scientists deserve my respect.
I fail to understand why people don't understand my technical jargon.
I experiment on myself without thinking about the long term consequences.
I am paranoid that people are out to steal my research.
I believe I work better when under the influence of intoxicants.
I work on my research to the point where I ignore my own bodily needs.

description.p: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of knowledge, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it. Usually, this information comes from a library, research facility, university, or a scholar. Your DM might rule that the knowledge you seek is secreted away in an almost inaccessible place, or that it simply cannot be found. Unearthing the deepest secrets of the galaxy can require an adventure or even a whole campaign.
You are a smooth-talking charmer, a gambler, or a silver-tongued negotiator. You know how to get what you want through persuasion, deception, or sheer force of personality.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, Performance, Sleight of Hand
Tool Proficiencies: Forgery kit
Equipment: A forgery kit, a set of fine clothes, a deck of cards, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Deception, Insight, Performance, Sleight of Hand, Forgery Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I fall in and out of love easily, and am always pursuing someone.
I have a joke for every occasion, especially occasions where humor is inappropriate.
Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want.
I'm a born gambler who can't resist taking a risk for a potential payoff.
I lie about almost everything, even when there's no good reason to.
Sarcasm and insults are my weapons of choice.
I keep multiple symbols on me and invoke whatever power might come in useful at any given moment.
I pocket anything I see that might have some value.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Independence. I am a free spirit no one tells me what to do. (Lawful)
Fairness. I never target people who can't afford to lose a few creds. (Good)
Charity. I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it. (Chaotic)
Creativity. I never run the same con twice. (Evil)
Friendship. Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I'm determined to make something of myself. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I fleeced the wrong person and must work to ensure that this individual never crosses paths with me or those I care about.
I owe everything to my mentor a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail somewhere.
Somewhere out there, I have a child who doesn't know me. I'm making the world better for him or her.
I come from a noble family, and one day I'll reclaim my lands and title from those who stole them from me.
A powerful person killed someone I love. Some day soon, I'll have my revenge.
I swindled and ruined a person who didn't deserve it, and I seek to atone for my misdeeds.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I can't resist a pretty face.
I'm always in debt. I spend my ill-gotten gains on decadent luxuries faster than I bring them in.
I'm convinced that no one could ever fool me the way I fool others.
I'm too greedy for my own good. I can't resist taking a risk if there's money involved.
I can't resist swindling people who are more powerful than me.
I hate to admit it and will hate myself for it, but I'll run and preserve my own hide if the going gets tough.

description.p: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona. Additionally, you can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.

You have been trained in the dark side of the Force, following the ancient traditions of the Sith. You seek power above all else, embracing your passions and emotions to fuel your connection to the Force.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, Intimidation, History, Arcana
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: A set of dark robes, a Sith holocron, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Deception, Insight, Intimidation, History, Arcana, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I idolize a particular Sith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
I seek power above all else.
I prefer using a lightsaber to solve my problems.
I have a plan for any situation.
I believe everyone is beneath me.
I prefer to let someone else do my dirty work.
Hatred and anger drive every decision I make.
Lying and scheming are second nature to me.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Patience. I will defeat my enemies in the end, I'm in no rush. (Lawful)
Disdain. I never try to help those in need, regardless of how simple it would be. (Good)
Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Chaotic)
Power. I hope to one day rise to the rank of Dark Lord of the Sith. (Evil)
Might. If I become strong, I can take what I want what I deserve. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I'll succeed in my goals at any cost. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I would die to recover an ancient Sith relic that was lost long ago.
I care only about myself.
I owe my life to the Sith who took me in when my parents died.
My enemies will be defeated, even if it costs me my life.
Someone I love was killed. Some day soon, I'll have my revenge.
My loyalty to my master is unwavering.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am too merciful, and empathize with those I shouldn't.
I put too much trust in those who rule over me.
I will never fully trust anyone other than myself.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
My pride will probably lead to my destruction.
Failure frightens me, and I get desperate if I think I might fail.

description.p: You know the Sith Code by heart: Peace is a lie, there is only passion. Through passion I gain strength. Through strength I gain power. Through power I gain victory. Through victory my chains are broken. The Force shall free me.
You have transported illegal goods across borders and past blockades. You know the best routes to avoid detection and how to hide contraband from prying eyes.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Acrobatics
Equipment: A set of traveler's clothes, a set of concealed pockets, and a belt pouch containing 150 credits

setters.set: Deception, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Acrobatics

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am extremely sociable, especially over a mug of ale.
I always keep my wares close to me, you never know who might stumble across them otherwise.
The best way to hide is out in the open.
I'm a terrible gossip.
Being seen with any unsavory figures is a sure way to undermine my work, which is why I work out of sight.
Deflecting questions has become second nature to me, so I rarely answer straight.
I have dozens of identities and live in constant fear of answering to the wrong name.
I act irrationally confident in the face of danger, nobody suspects anything when you seem like you're in charge.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Morals. I only smuggle things to improve the lives of the common folk. (Lawful)
Ruthless. I will rise to the top of the heap by any means necessary. (Good)
Friendship. My associates are dear to me, and I want them to rise with me when I hit it big. (Chaotic)
Dauntless. No border crossing or bribe is too difficult- that's just the coward's way of saying exciting! (Evil)
Greater Good. I work for a greater cause, and ply my trade only in service to it. (Neutral)
Unperturbed. I only want to make a living for myself, and smuggling is just an edge I can use to do so. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: A corrupt official shut me down back in my honest days. I aim to show him a thing or two about recovery.
I never wanted to be a criminal, but it pays the bills.
A bloodthirsty pirate stole a shipment from me and killed a dear friend of mine. I will have my vengeance.
Someone I cared about discovered my profession and has publicly denounced me, and I am caught between protecting my reputation and restoring our relationship.
My love interest is someone who once stole from right under my nose- but they have no idea who I am or how much I admire them for their accomplishment.
My business partners are closer to me than my family.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: "Trust nobody, not even yourself." I am plagued by paranoia.
I'm so charismatic that sometimes I woo myself. Who am I, Narcissus?
Money is my greatest motivator. I'll do almost anything given enough of it, even if I'll regret it later.
I would betray anyone to save my own skin.
I detach myself from the results of my actions in order to sleep better at night.
Someone who knows me well might call me "two-faced" but those who don't have no idea what hit 'em.

description.p: You have advantage when bribing officials and can always find a safe house or secret route to move contraband. You know who to talk to and how much to pay to get what you need across borders.

War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You trained as a youth, studied the use of weapons and armor, learned basic survival techniques, including how to stay alive on the battlefield.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Athletics, Intimidation, Persuasion, Investigation
Languages: One of your choice
Equipment: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy, a set of common clothes, 1 plasma grenade, 1 ion grenade, and a belt pouch containing 100 credits

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I'm always polite and respectful.
I'm haunted by memories of war. I can't get the images of violence out of my mind.
I've lost too many friends, and I'm slow to make new ones.
I'm full of inspiring and cautionary tales from my military experience relevant to almost every combat situation.
I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
I enjoy being strong and like breaking things.
I have a crude sense of humor.
I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others. (Lawful)
Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority. (Good)
Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny. (Chaotic)
Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins. (Evil)
Live and Let Live. Ideals aren't worth killing over or going to war for. (Neutral)
Nation. My city, nation, or people are all that matter. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.
My honor is my life.
I'll never forget the crushing defeat my company suffered or the enemies who dealt it.
Those who fight beside me are those worth dying for.
I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: The monstrous enemy we faced in battle still leaves me quivering with fear.
I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.
I made a terrible mistake in battle cost many lives and I would do anything to keep that mistake secret.
My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.
I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.
I'd rather eat my armor than admit when I'm wrong.

description.p: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment for temporary use.
You are a member of Clan Vizsla, one of the most ancient and respected Mandalorian clans, known for producing many great leaders and warriors.
You are a member of Clan Fett, a clan known for its bounty hunters and mercenaries who have left their mark on galactic history.
You are a member of Clan Varad, known for their fierce warriors and tactical brilliance in battle.
You are a member of Clan Ordo, a clan with a proud military tradition and honor-bound warriors.
You are a member of Clan Lok, known for their stealth and precision in combat.
You are a member of Clan Cadera, a clan that values honor and tradition above all else.
You have no clan affiliation, either by choice or circumstance. You walk your own path among the Mandalorians.
